list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Update dependencies and cleanup ESLint configuration
- Upgrade `@liveblocks` packages to `3.0.0` and `@tiptap` extensions to `2.23.0`. - Remove `eslint-config-standard` for streamlined configurations. - Adjust `.idea/workspace.xml` for updated file tracking and properties.

task.summary: Default task
Initialize Next.js project with Tailwind CSS, ESLint, and base configurations.
Add UI primitive components with Radix UI and custom styles.
Enhance project setup with Prettier, ESLint, and TailwindCSS configurations. Optimize imports and improve formatting across components.
Integrate TipTap editor into document page and simplify DocumentsLayout structure. Add TipTap dependencies.

Update TipTap editor implementation with additional extensions and improved table handling.
- Add new TipTap extensions (Image, Table, TaskList, and resize capabilities). - Update dependencies for TipTap-related packages in `package.json` and `package-lock.json`.

Add Toolbar and extensions for advanced text styling in TipTap editor.
- Implement `Toolbar` with buttons for text formatting, alignment, and other actions. - Introduce `font-size` and `line-height` extensions for enhanced text customization. - Integrate `Toolbar` into the document page.

Add Ruler component for adjustable margins in TipTap editor.
- Implement `Ruler` for visual margin adjustment via draggable markers. - Integrate `Ruler` into the editor interface. - Update dependencies to include `react-icons` for marker icons.

Integrate Navbar into document page for enhanced user interaction.
- Implement `Navbar` with improved layout for file, edit, and format menus. - Add `DocumentInput` component for document title display. - Include `logo.svg` for branding and navigation. - Update `Toolbar` styling and integrate within the `Navbar`.

Add save functionality for JSON, HTML, and Text formats in Navbar.
- Implement export handlers for JSON, HTML, and Text from the editor. - Update Navbar menu items to trigger respective save actions.

Remove unused hooks and SVG assets, add new assets and components for document templates.
- Delete unused `use-mobile.tsx`, `use-toast.ts`, and old SVG assets. - Add new SVG assets for document templates: `software-proposal.svg`, `resume.svg`. - Create `Navbar` component under `src/app/(home)` for enhanced navigation.

Integrate document management functionalities with Convex backend and UI components.
- Implement `DocumentsTable` and `DocumentRow` components to list documents. - Add `RenameDialog` and `RemoveDialog` components for document renaming and deletion. - Create dropdown menu for document actions, including open in a new tab. - Set up Convex queries and mutations for document CRUD operations. - Configure Clerk authentication middleware and integrate `UserButton` in Navbar.

Standardize string quotations and update alignment in various files.
- Replace all single quotes with double quotes across `convex/auth.config.ts`, `convex/documents.ts`, and other components. - Adjust formatting and alignment for improved readability in files such as `navbar.tsx`, `template-gallery.tsx`, `search-input.tsx`. - Add error handling and navigation in `template-gallery.tsx` for better user experience during template creation.

Enhance document page with Convex integration and improved UI functionality.
- Add Convex preloaded queries for fetching document data. - Implement updated document title editing with debounced updates and error handling. - Integrate `Navbar` with rename and delete dialogs for document management. - Include `OrganizationSwitcher` in Navbar for organization selection. - Replace inline components with modular imports for better readability and structure.

Update Navbar logo title styling.
- Adjust font size and weight for improved accessibility and visual balance.

Add generated Convex utilities and data model.
- Include `api`, `server`, and `dataModel` autogenerated modules. - Provide type definitions and utilities for Convex queries, mutations, actions, and HTTP handling. - Add documentation for usage and regeneration instructions.

Integrate Liveblocks for real-time collaboration and enhance document functionality.
- Add `liveblocks.config.ts` for type definitions and configuration. - Implement `Avatars` and Liveblocks-aware `Ruler` for collaboration. - Update Convex authorization logic to support organization-based room access. - Enhance `Editor` with Liveblocks extensions for shared editing experience. - Refactor multiple components (`DocumentsTable`, `DocumentRow`, etc.) for consistency and maintainability.

Refactor Convex handlers and improve document creation flow.
- Use object destructuring for Convex handler arguments for consistency. - Simplify document manipulation logic in `documents.ts`. - Add toast notification for successful document creation in `template-gallery.tsx`. - Enable immediate rendering in the editor for better UX. - Add debugging `console.log` statements in document components for troubleshooting.

Remove redundant `console.log` statements and improve component implementations.
- Remove debugging `console.log` statements from multiple components. - Refactor `RemoveDialog` to support callback on success instead of direct navigation. - Simplify conditional rendering in `Document` component. - Adjust code comments for clarity and context.

Refactor `RemoveDialog` to use `useRouter` for navigation and clean up redundant props.
- Remove the `onSuccess` callback in `RemoveDialog` and replace it with direct navigation using `useRouter`. - Update `navbar.tsx` to align with the refactored `RemoveDialog` API.

Refactor `documents.ts` to use constant for table name and improve default values
- Replace hardcoded table name with `DOCUMENTS_TABLE` constant for consistency. - Set default value for `initialContent` to an empty string. - Update all queries and mutations in `documents.ts` to use the `DOCUMENTS_TABLE` constant.

Refactor various document components and improve Liveblocks integration
- Update `actions.ts` and `liveblocks-auth/route.ts` to enhance organization ID handling with proper fallback and cleaner syntax. - Replace `Threads` implementation with `ClientSideSuspense` to improve rendering in `threads.tsx`. - Refactor `editor.tsx` by removing unused `FloatingToolbar` for a leaner UI.

Remove `Chart` component and related utilities
- Delete `src/components/ui/chart.tsx` and its dependencies as it is no longer used or required. - Update `.idea/workspace.xml` to remove references and adjust tasks accordingly.

Refactor organization ID handling and eslint configuration
- Replace `@ts-ignore` with `@ts-expect-error` in `actions.ts` and `liveblocks-auth/route.ts` for stricter error handling. - Add `eslint-config-standard` and related dependencies to improve code style enforcement. - Minor cleanup in `use-toast.ts` (`eslint-disable` adjustments, removed redundant props).

Add new icons and update `.idea/workspace.xml` configuration
- Introduce new SVG and PNG icons (`icon0.svg`, `icon1.png`, `apple-icon.png`, `favicon.ico`) for project assets. - Update `.idea/workspace.xml` to reflect task adjustments and duration changes.

Downgrade dependencies for Liveblocks and TipTap extensions
- Update `@liveblocks` packages to version `2.12.2` for compatibility. - Update `@tiptap` extensions to version `2.10.2` for alignment. - Adjust `.idea/workspace.xml` configuration to reflect changes. - Set `immediatelyRender` to `false` in `editor.tsx` to optimize client-side rendering.
fix template gallery for viewport between 1024px and 1279px
improve performance with useCallback in room.tsx and removing redundant Image Extension in editor.tsx + refactor getByIds in documents.ts
Remove `DocumentsLayout` and `DocumentsPage` components and wrap `Ruler` in `ClientSideSuspense` to improve rendering.

Add API route and integration to remove Liveblocks rooms
- Create `/api/liveblocks-room-remove/route.ts` for handling room deletions via POST requests. - Integrate `removeRoom` utility in `actions.ts` and `remove-dialog.tsx` for consistent room removal logic. - Update `RemoveDialog` to ensure Liveblocks room deletion when a document is removed.
Remove `ClientSideSuspense` wrapper from `Ruler` component in `editor.tsx` for simplified rendering.

Update dependencies and cleanup ESLint configuration
- Upgrade `@liveblocks` packages to `3.0.0` and `@tiptap` extensions to `2.23.0`. - Remove `eslint-config-standard` for streamlined configurations. - Adjust `.idea/workspace.xml` for updated file tracking and properties.

MESSAGE.value:
Integrate document management functionalities with Convex backend and UI components.
- Implement `DocumentsTable` and `DocumentRow` components to list documents. - Add `RenameDialog` and `RemoveDialog` components for document renaming and deletion. - Create dropdown menu for document actions, including open in a new tab. - Set up Convex queries and mutations for document CRUD operations. - Configure Clerk authentication middleware and integrate `UserButton` in Navbar.

Standardize string quotations and update alignment in various files.
- Replace all single quotes with double quotes across `convex/auth.config.ts`, `convex/documents.ts`, and other components. - Adjust formatting and alignment for improved readability in files such as `navbar.tsx`, `template-gallery.tsx`, `search-input.tsx`. - Add error handling and navigation in `template-gallery.tsx` for better user experience during template creation.

Enhance document page with Convex integration and improved UI functionality.
- Add Convex preloaded queries for fetching document data. - Implement updated document title editing with debounced updates and error handling. - Integrate `Navbar` with rename and delete dialogs for document management. - Include `OrganizationSwitcher` in Navbar for organization selection. - Replace inline components with modular imports for better readability and structure.

Update Navbar logo title styling.
- Adjust font size and weight for improved accessibility and visual balance.

Add generated Convex utilities and data model.
- Include `api`, `server`, and `dataModel` autogenerated modules. - Provide type definitions and utilities for Convex queries, mutations, actions, and HTTP handling. - Add documentation for usage and regeneration instructions.

Integrate Liveblocks for real-time collaboration and enhance document functionality.
- Add `liveblocks.config.ts` for type definitions and configuration. - Implement `Avatars` and Liveblocks-aware `Ruler` for collaboration. - Update Convex authorization logic to support organization-based room access. - Enhance `Editor` with Liveblocks extensions for shared editing experience. - Refactor multiple components (`DocumentsTable`, `DocumentRow`, etc.) for consistency and maintainability.

Refactor Convex handlers and improve document creation flow.
- Use object destructuring for Convex handler arguments for consistency. - Simplify document manipulation logic in `documents.ts`. - Add toast notification for successful document creation in `template-gallery.tsx`. - Enable immediate rendering in the editor for better UX. - Add debugging `console.log` statements in document components for troubleshooting.

Remove redundant `console.log` statements and improve component implementations.
- Remove debugging `console.log` statements from multiple components. - Refactor `RemoveDialog` to support callback on success instead of direct navigation. - Simplify conditional rendering in `Document` component. - Adjust code comments for clarity and context.

Refactor `RemoveDialog` to use `useRouter` for navigation and clean up redundant props.
- Remove the `onSuccess` callback in `RemoveDialog` and replace it with direct navigation using `useRouter`. - Update `navbar.tsx` to align with the refactored `RemoveDialog` API.

Refactor `documents.ts` to use constants for table names and improve defaults.
- Replace hardcoded table name strings with `DOCUMENTS_TABLE` constant for consistency. - Set default value for `initialContent` during document creation to prevent undefined entries.

Refactor `documents.ts` to use constant for table name and improve default values
- Replace hardcoded table name with `DOCUMENTS_TABLE` constant for consistency. - Set default value for `initialContent` to an empty string. - Update all queries and mutations in `documents.ts` to use the `DOCUMENTS_TABLE` constant.

Refactor document-related components and enhance real-time collaboration features
- Update `actions.ts` to improve organization ID handling in Clerk user list fetch. - Enhance `threads.tsx` with `ClientSideSuspense` for better loading states and modularize `ThreadsList`. - Simplify `editor.tsx` by removing unused `FloatingToolbar` and cleaning up imports.

Refactor various document components and improve Liveblocks integration
- Update `actions.ts` and `liveblocks-auth/route.ts` to enhance organization ID handling with proper fallback and cleaner syntax. - Replace `Threads` implementation with `ClientSideSuspense` to improve rendering in `threads.tsx`. - Refactor `editor.tsx` by removing unused `FloatingToolbar` for a leaner UI.

Remove `Chart` component and related utilities
- Delete `src/components/ui/chart.tsx` and its dependencies as it is no longer used or required. - Update `.idea/workspace.xml` to remove references and adjust tasks accordingly.

Refactor organization ID handling and eslint configuration
- Replace `@ts-ignore` with `@ts-expect-error` in `actions.ts` and `liveblocks-auth/route.ts` for stricter error handling. - Add `eslint-config-standard` and related dependencies to improve code style enforcement. - Minor cleanup in `use-toast.ts` (`eslint-disable` adjustments, removed redundant props).

Add new icons and update `.idea/workspace.xml` configuration
- Introduce new SVG and PNG icons (`icon0.svg`, `icon1.png`, `apple-icon.png`, `favicon.ico`) for project assets. - Update `.idea/workspace.xml` to reflect task adjustments and duration changes.

Downgrade dependencies for Liveblocks and TipTap extensions
- Update `@liveblocks` packages to version `2.12.2` for compatibility. - Update `@tiptap` extensions to version `2.10.2` for alignment. - Adjust `.idea/workspace.xml` configuration to reflect changes. - Set `immediatelyRender` to `false` in `editor.tsx` to optimize client-side rendering.

Add redirect for non-existent documents and improve `RemoveDialog` error handling
- Redirect users to the homepage if a document does not exist in `[documentId]/page.tsx`. - Fix `RemoveDialog` to properly reset `isRemoving` state on failures.
fix template gallery for viewport between 1024px and 1279px
improve performance with useCallback in room.tsx and removing redundant Image Extension in editor.tsx + refactor getByIds in documents.ts
Remove `DocumentsLayout` and `DocumentsPage` components and wrap `Ruler` in `ClientSideSuspense` to improve rendering.

Add API route and integration to remove Liveblocks rooms
- Create `/api/liveblocks-room-remove/route.ts` for handling room deletions via POST requests. - Integrate `removeRoom` utility in `actions.ts` and `remove-dialog.tsx` for consistent room removal logic. - Update `RemoveDialog` to ensure Liveblocks room deletion when a document is removed.
Remove `ClientSideSuspense` wrapper from `Ruler` component in `editor.tsx` for simplified rendering.
Wrap `Editor` component in `ClientSideSuspense` in `[documentId]/document.tsx` for improved loading fallback.

Update dependencies and cleanup ESLint configuration
- Upgrade `@liveblocks` packages to `3.0.0` and `@tiptap` extensions to `2.23.0`. - Remove `eslint-config-standard` for streamlined configurations. - Adjust `.idea/workspace.xml` for updated file tracking and properties.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Update dependencies and cleanup ESLint configuration
- Upgrade `@liveblocks` packages to `3.0.0` and `@tiptap` extensions to `2.23.0`. - Remove `eslint-config-standard` for streamlined configurations. - Adjust `.idea/workspace.xml` for updated file tracking and properties.
